documentation.text: @dev The address that receives all primary sales value.
@dev Lets a contract admin set the recipient for all primary sales.
@dev Returns whether primary sale recipient can be set in the given execution context.
@dev The address that receives all primary sales value.
@dev Lets a contract admin set the recipient for all primary sales.
@dev Returns whether primary sale recipient can be set in the given execution context.

setPrimarySaleRecipient(address).details: Caller should be authorized to set primary sales info.                  See {_canSetPrimarySaleRecipient}.                  Emits {PrimarySaleRecipientUpdated Event}; See {_setupPrimarySaleRecipient}.

params._saleRecipient: Address to be set as new recipient of primary sales.

recipient.details: The address that receives all primary sales value.

userdoc.notice: Thirdweb's `PrimarySale` is a contract extension to be used with any base contract. It exposes functions for setting and reading           the recipient of primary sales, and lets the inheriting contract perform conditional logic that uses information about           primary sales, if desired.
